alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 28 at 5:01PM PDT until September 28 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL RIVERSIDE AND SOUTHWEST SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 501 PM PDT, Doppler radar is indicating that the thunderstorms that produced heavy rain are rapidly weakening. With indications of around an inch of rain in less than an hour, ample flooding issues likely remain. HAZARD...Dangerous and potentially damaging flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Dangerous flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Redlands, Yucaipa, Calimesa including Highway 10. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
